entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow or freezing rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning and afternoon.
